user.content:
1→networks:
     2→  wolf_network:
     3→    driver: bridge
     4→
     5→volumes:
     6→  prometheus_data:
     7→  grafana_data:
     8→  authentik_database:
     9→  authentik_redis:
    10→  portainer_data:
    11→  neo4j_data:
    12→  mariadb_data:
    13→
    14→services:
    15→  # Portainer - Container Management (PRIORITY 1)
    16→  portainer:
    17→    image: portainer/portainer-ce:latest
    18→    container_name: portainer
    19→    restart: unless-stopped
    20→    networks:
    21→      - wolf_network
    22→    ports:
    23→      - "9000:9000"
    24→      - "9443:9443"
    25→    volumes:
    26→      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
    27→      - portainer_data:/data
    28→
    29→  # Prometheus - Metrics Collection
    30→  prometheus:
    31→    image: prom/prometheus:latest
    32→    container_name: prometheus
    33→    restart: unless-stopped
    34→    networks:
    35→      - wolf_network
    36→    ports:
    37→      - "9090:9090"
    38→    volumes:
    39→      - ./monitoring/prometheus.yml:/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
    40→      - prometheus_data:/prometheus
    41→    command:
    42→      - '--config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml'
    43→      - '--storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus'
    44→
    45→  # Grafana - Monitoring Dashboard
    46→  grafana:
    47→    image: grafana/grafana:latest
    48→    container_name: grafana
    49→    restart: unless-stopped
    50→    networks:
    51→      - wolf_network
    52→    ports:
    53→      - "3000:3000"
    54→    volumes:
    55→      - grafana_data:/var/lib/grafana
    56→    environment:
    57→      - GF_SERVER_ROOT_URL=https://grafana.complexsimplicityai.com/
    58→      - GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD=wolflogic2024
    59→
    60→  # Node Exporter - System Metrics
    61→  node-exporter:
    62→    image: prom/node-exporter:latest
    63→    container_name: node-exporter
    64→    restart: unless-stopped
    65→    networks:
    66→      - wolf_network
    67→    ports:
    68→      - "9100:9100"
    69→    command:
    70→      - '--path.procfs=/host/proc'
    71→      - '--path.sysfs=/host/sys'
    72→      - '--collector.filesystem.mount-points-exclude=^/(sys|proc|dev|host|etc)($$|/)'
    73→    volumes:
    74→      - /proc:/host/proc:ro
    75→      - /sys:/host/sys:ro
    76→      - /:/rootfs:ro
    77→
    78→  # cAdvisor - Container Metrics
    79→  cadvisor:
    80→    image: gcr.io/cadvisor/cadvisor:latest
    81→    container_name: cadvisor
    82→    restart: unless-stopped
    83→    networks:
    84→      - wolf_network
    85→    ports:
    86→      - "8081:8080"
    87→    volumes:
    88→      - /:/rootfs:ro
    89→      - /var/run:/var/run:ro
    90→      - /sys:/sys:ro
    91→      - /var/lib/docker/:/var/lib/docker:ro
    92→      - /dev/disk/:/dev/disk:ro
    93→    privileged: true
    94→
    95→  # Authentik PostgreSQL
    96→  authentik-postgresql:
    97→    image: postgres:16-alpine
    98→    container_name: authentik-postgresql
    99→    restart: unless-stopped
   100→    networks:
   101→      - wolf_network
   102→    volumes:
   103→      - authentik_database:/var/lib/postgresql/data
   104→    environment:
   105→      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: wolflogic2024
   106→      POSTGRES_USER: authentik
   107→      POSTGRES_DB: authentik
   108→
   109→  # Authentik Redis
   110→  authentik-redis:
   111→    image: redis:alpine
   112→    container_name: authentik-redis
   113→    restart: unless-stopped
   114→    networks:
   115→      - wolf_network
   116→    command: --save 60 1 --loglevel warning
   117→
   118→  # Authentik Server
   119→  authentik-server:
   120→    image: ghcr.io/goauthentik/server:latest
   121→    container_name: authentik-server
   122→    restart: unless-stopped
   123→    command: server
   124→    networks:
   125→      - wolf_network
   126→    ports:
   127→      - "9001:9000"
   128→      - "9443:9443"
   129→    environment:
   130→      AUTHENTIK_REDIS__HOST: authentik-redis
   131→      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__HOST: authentik-postgresql
   132→      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__USER: authentik
   133→      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__NAME: authentik
   134→      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__PASSWORD: wolflogic2024
   135→      AUTHENTIK_SECRET_KEY: wolf-authentik-secret-change-me-in-production
   136→    depends_on:
   137→      - authentik-postgresql
   138→      - authentik-redis
   139→
   140→  # Authentik Worker
   141→  authentik-worker:
   142→    image: ghcr.io/goauthentik/server:latest
   143→    container_name: authentik-worker
   144→    restart: unless-stopped
   145→    command: worker
   146→    networks:
   147→      - wolf_network
   148→    environment:
   149→      AUTHENTIK_REDIS__HOST: authentik-redis
   150→      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__HOST: authentik-postgresql
   151→      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__USER: authentik
   152→      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__NAME: authentik
   153→      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__PASSWORD: wolflogic2024
   154→      AUTHENTIK_SECRET_KEY: wolf-authentik-secret-change-me-in-production
   155→    depends_on:
   156→      - authentik-postgresql
   157→      - authentik-redis
   158→
   159→  # Neo4j - Graph Database
   160→  neo4j:
   161→    image: neo4j:latest
   162→    container_name: neo4j
   163→    restart: unless-stopped
   164→    networks:
   165→      - wolf_network
   166→    ports:
   167→      - "7474:7474"
   168→      - "7687:7687"
   169→    volumes:
   170→      - neo4j_data:/data
   171→    environment:
   172→      - NEO4J_AUTH=neo4j/wolflogic2024
   173→
   174→  # MariaDB
   175→  mariadb:
   176→    image: mariadb:latest
   177→    container_name: mariadb
   178→    restart: unless-stopped
   179→    networks:
   180→      - wolf_network
   181→    ports:
   182→      - "3306:3306"
   183→    volumes:
   184→      - mariadb_data:/var/lib/mysql
   185→    environment:
   186→      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: wolflogic2024
   187→      MYSQL_DATABASE: wolf_db
   188→
   189→  # Wolf REST API
   190→  wolf-rest-api:
   191→    image: api-wolf-rest-api:latest
   192→    container_name: wolf-rest-api
   193→    restart: unless-stopped
   194→    networks:
   195→      - wolf_network
   196→    ports:
   197→      - "3030:3000"
   198→    environment:
   199→      - POSTGRES_HOST=100.110.82.181
   200→      - POSTGRES_PORT=5433
   201→      - POSTGRES_USER=wolf
   202→      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=wolflogic2024
   203→      - POSTGRES_DB=wolf_logic
   204→
   205→  # # Wolf Registration API
   206→  # wolf-registration-api:
   207→  #   image: wolf-registration-api:latest
   208→  #   container_name: wolf-registration-api
   209→  #   restart: unless-stopped
   210→  #   networks:
   211→  #     - wolf_network
   212→  #   ports:
   213→  #     - "8765:8765"
   214→
   215→  # Wolf API (FastAPI)
   216→  wolf-api:
   217→    image: wolf-api:latest
   218→    container_name: wolf-api
   219→    restart: unless-stopped
   220→    networks:
   221→      - wolf_network
   222→    ports:
   223→      - "8000:8000"
   224→    environment:
   225→      - POSTGRES_HOST=100.110.82.181
   226→      - POSTGRES_PORT=5433
   227→      - POSTGRES_USER=wolf
   228→      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=wolflogic2024
   229→      - POSTGRES_DB=wolf_logic
   230→
   231→  # Wolf Hunt API
   232→  wolf-hunt-api:
   233→    image: wolf-hunt-api:latest
   234→    container_name: wolf-hunt-api
   235→    restart: unless-stopped
   236→    networks:
   237→      - wolf_network
   238→    ports:
   239→      - "5000:5000"
   240→    environment:
   241→      - POSTGRES_HOST=100.110.82.181
   242→      - POSTGRES_PORT=5433
   243→      - POSTGRES_USER=wolf
   244→      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=wolflogic2024
   245→      - POSTGRES_DB=wolf_logic
   246→
   247→  # Wolf Hunt UI
   248→  wolf-hunt-ui:
   249→    image: wolf-hunt-ui:latest
   250→    container_name: wolf-hunt-ui
   251→    restart: unless-stopped
   252→    networks:
   253→      - wolf_network
   254→    ports:
   255→      - "3333:3333"
   256→
   257→  # Wolf MCP Server
   258→  wolf-mcp:
   259→    image: wolf-mcp:latest
   260→    container_name: wolf-mcp
   261→    restart: unless-stopped
   262→    networks:
   263→      - wolf_network
   264→    ports:
   265→      - "8001:8001"
   266→    environment:
   267→      - POSTGRES_HOST=100.110.82.181
   268→      - POSTGRES_PORT=5433
   269→      - POSTGRES_USER=wolf
   270→      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=wolflogic2024
   271→      - POSTGRES_DB=wolf_logic
   272→      - MCP_HTTP_MODE=true
   273→
   274→  # Open WebUI
   275→  open-webui:
   276→    image: ghcr.io/open-webui/open-webui:main
   277→    container_name: open-webui
   278→    restart: unless-stopped
   279→    networks:
   280→      - wolf_network
   281→    ports:
   282→      - "3005:8080"
   283→    volumes:
   284→      - ./open-webui:/app/backend/data
   285→
   286→  # AnythingLLM
   287→  anything-llm:
   288→    image: mintplexlabs/anythingllm
   289→    container_name: anything-llm
   290→    restart: unless-stopped
   291→    networks:
   292→      - wolf_network
   293→    ports:
   294→      - "3001:3001"
   295→    volumes:
   296→      - ./anythingllm:/app/server/storage
   297→
   298→  # Beta Memory Site
   299→  beta-memory-site:
   300→    image: traefik-beta-memory-site:latest
   301→    container_name: beta-memory-site
   302→    restart: unless-stopped
   303→    networks:
   304→      - wolf_network
   305→    ports:
   306→      - "5001:5000"
   307→
